Taiwan: Pirate Lin Feng lands in southwestern Taiwan only to be attacked by aboriginals
Lin Feng returns to Taiwan again
Philippine: The Chinese pirate captain Limahong attacks Manila but fails
Limahong again attacks Manila with 1500 soldiers but again fails to defeat the Spaniards
Lakandula leads a short revolt against the Spanish.
India: Guru Ram Das becomes fourth Guru of Sikhs.
France: Charles IX died. With no heir, he was succeeded by his brother Henry III.
Chile: Spanish captain Juan Fernández discovers the Juan Fernández Islands.
Belgium: Don Luis de Requesens, Governor of the Habsburg Netherlands, issues general pardon to rebels willing to return to loyalty.
